channel.title: Software Development on Ru-Lai's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development on Ru-Lai's Blog

item.title: One (and a Half) Reasons You Should ALWAYS Be Working on Side Projects.
item.description: Starting the new facebook. Picture your day-to-day at work. You go into the office, sit down, do your morning standup — a quick meeting in the agile method to update everyone on the progress you have made on your tasks — and open your email to see what meetings you have. You walk down the hall to whichever break room has been allotted to your team and pour yourself a cup of coffee.
